author: tellison
msg: Part of HARMONY-5077 ([classlib][io] a stress test org.apache.harmony.test.stress.api.java.io.stress.readers.StringReader.StringReaderWriterStressTest.testManyStreams deadlocks)
Don't need to synchronize on calls to StringBuffer that are already synchronized methods.
